```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
```

If you want to run this document indepdently of `tar_render` from the main targets pipeline, set this to `eval = TRUE`
```{r, eval=FALSE}
targets::tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
```

Alternatively, this is a robust way:

```{r}
in_targets <- function() {
  nzchar(Sys.getenv("TAR_TARGET"))
}
if (!in_targets()) {
  targets::tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
}
```
